alert.note: Alert for Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 12:19PM CDT until March 17 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas...Tennessee...Missouri...Mississippi... Mississippi River at Caruthersville Mississippi River at Osceola Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, In Mississippi, the river is touching the levee at many places near Mhoon Landing. The road to Stubb`s Island is closed. Fields are flooding inside the levee west of Seabrook Road. Water has reached the outlot of McKinney Bayou Pumping Station. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 28.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 10.5 feet Tuesday, April 04. - Action stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
